clinical_study.brief_title: An Epidemiological Cohort Study of Acute Coronary Syndromes in The Greek Population. The PHAETHON Study
clinical_study.official_title: An Epidemiological Cohort Study of Acute Coronary Syndromes in The Greek Population. The PHAETHON Study

brief_summary.textblock: A nationwide registry of patients with acute coronary disease to evaluate epidemiological patient characteristics, medical management, implementation of invasive strategy, patient outcome and impact on quality of life in Greece.

detailed_description.textblock: A nationwide registry of patients with acute coronary disease to evaluate epidemiological patient characteristics, medical management, implementation of invasive strategy, patient outcome and impact on quality of life in Greece.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of patients with Acute Coronary Syndromes.
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of the epidemiological characteristics of patients who were hospitalized with a diagnosis of ACS. Evaluation of the therapeutic strategy and its outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Estimation of the percentage of patients.
secondary_outcome.description: Estimation of the percentage of patients who were hospitalized with STEMI, NSTEMI and unstable angina.

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of the methods of patients' evacuation.
secondary_outcome.description: Description of the methods of patients' evacuation from the scene of the incident to the receiving hospital where was processed the treatment for ACS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Estimation of the interval until the arrival in the hospital.
secondary_outcome.description: Estimation of the duration from the onset of pain until the arrival in the receiving hospital at various locations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the blood test analysis during hospitalization.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of hematological, biochemical parameters and myocardial necrosis markers during hospitalization.
Description of the pharmaceutical treatment administered during hospitalization and monitoring period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the male patients with erectile dysfunction.
secondary_outcome.description: Estimation of the percentage of the male patients with erectile dysfuction based to a predesigned questionnaire and investigation of the possible association with the treatment's outcome.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Informed Consent
- > 25 years
- Admission in hospital within 24 hours from beginning of symptoms of transfer from antother hospital within 24 hours from beginning of symptoms.
- Acute Coronary Syndrom
Exclusion Criteria:
